summary: In a complex piece of espionage the Russian secret service attempts to kidnap a high ranking officer in the CIA and replace him with a double of its own.
cast: Yul Brynner|Britt Ekland|Clive Revill|Anton Diffring|Moira Lister|Lloyd Nolan|George Mikell|Brandon Brady|Julia Arnall|David Bauer|Ronald Radd|Kenneth J. Warren|David Healy|Carl Jaffe|Douglas Muir|Frederick Schiller|Ernst Walder|Rock Brynner|Pauline Chamberlain|Bee Duffell|John G. Heller|John Herrington|Alfred Hoffman|Robert O'Neil|Franklin J. Schaffner|David Scheuer|Guy Standeven
title: Mi doble en los Alpes
